source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT CASE 
         WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'Customer') 
         THEN 1 
         ELSE 0 
       END AS TableExists

scripts.text:
Create table Customer
(ID int,
Customer_Name varchar(max),
Salary float
)

content.value: Pipeline Run Successful: Your ADF pipeline completed successfully.

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT Enabled FROM dbo.Config WHERE Name = 'Customer'
select MAX(LastModifytime) as NewWatermarkvalue from data_source_table

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from data_source_table where LastModifytime > '@{activity('LookupOldWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}' and LastModifytime <= '@{activity('LookupNewWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}'

select * from source_table where LastModifytime > '@{activity('LookupOldWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}' and LastModifytime <= '@{activity('LookupNewWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}'

source.sqlReaderQuery: select MAX(LastModifytime) as NewWatermarkvalue from source_table

scriptLines: aggregate1 derive(CustomerSegment = iif(TotalSpend > 5000, 'High Spender', iif(TotalSpend >= 1000, 'Medium Spender', 'Low Spender'))) ~> derivedColumn2
